  • pyholster.errors

Source code for pyholster.errors

[docs]class PHException(Exception):

    """General exception, parent to all other exceptions."""
    pass



class PHNotSettableError(PHException):
    pass


class PHVerifyFailed(PHException):
    pass


class PHDuplicateAddress(PHException):
    pass



[docs]class PHRequestException(PHException):
    """Request exceptions are thrown due to HTTP response codes and descendants
    of PHRequestException."""

    pass




[docs]class PHBadRequest(PHRequestException):
    """Server returned a 400 `Bad Request` code."""

    pass




[docs]class PHUnauthorized(PHRequestException):
    """Server returned a 401 `Unauthorized` code."""

    pass




[docs]class PHFailed(PHRequestException):
    """Server returned a 402 `Failed` code."""

    pass




[docs]class PHNotFound(PHRequestException):
    """Server returned a 404 `Not Found` code."""

    pass




[docs]class PHServerError(PHRequestException):
    """Server returned a 500, 502, 503, or 504 `Server Error` code."""

    pass




[docs]class PHUnknown(PHRequestException):
    """Server returned a unknown HTTP status code."""

    pass




[docs]class PHNotAcceptable(PHRequestException):
    """Server returned a 406 `Not Acceptable` code."""

    pass



html_status_codes = {
    400: PHBadRequest,
    401: PHUnauthorized,
    402: PHFailed,
    404: PHNotFound,
    406: PHNotAcceptable,
    500: PHServerError,
    502: PHServerError,
    503: PHServerError,
    504: PHServerError
}
